about_the_game: Duskmire's demo offers you the opportunity to experience the core action mechanics of the game and experiment with a selection of spells. Please note that this demo is a limited preview, and as such, end-game bosses, certain items, and additional spells are not included. While playing, remember that this is a demo, and some features are intentionally withheld. We greatly appreciate your understanding and feedback as you play through this early version of the game. Thank you in advance for your time and for trying out our demo!

content_descriptors.notes: Since the game is an action-intensive roguelike, there is blood when you defeat enemies. Please be aware if this might disturb you.

detailed_description: Duskmire's demo offers you the opportunity to experience the core action mechanics of the game and experiment with a selection of spells. Please note that this demo is a limited preview, and as such, end-game bosses, certain items, and additional spells are not included. While playing, remember that this is a demo, and some features are intentionally withheld. We greatly appreciate your understanding and feedback as you play through this early version of the game. Thank you in advance for your time and for trying out our demo!
name: Duskmire Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A thrilling atmospheric 2D action rogue-lite platformer filled with countless spells and magical combinations. Craft your strategy by mixing powerful spells. Each playthrough offers unique and breathtaking atmospheres where you can face challenging experiences.
